CustomField.description: Value to populate target field with if comparison evaluates to true - This can be in the form of a merge field on the source object e.g. {!SourceFieldName}. Otherwise, the value will be copied as is.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Value to populate target field with if comparison evaluates to true - This can be in the form of a merge field on the source object e.g. {!SourceFieldName}. Otherwise, the value will be copied as is. (only necessary if this is a complex mapping)
CustomField.label: Target Value
